name: Canix
headline: Canix makes it easy to get and stay compliant as a cannabis business.
description:
Canix is building the first generation of modern software for the burgeoning cannabis industry. We help our customers overcome daunting compliance regulation, sell more product, and optimize their day to day operations—from cultivation, to processing, to distribution.

Recent winner of TechCrunch Disrupt 2020, find out more at TechCrunch and canix.com.

# Unlock the Full Potential of Your Cannabis Business
Take control of your business with Canix, the most trusted ERP software designed specifically for the cannabis industry. Canix helps cultivators, manufacturers and distributors stay ahead of the competition by reducing labor costs and improving operations. Don't let manual processes hold you back. 
[**Schedule a Call**](https://www.canix.com/</campaign/schedule-a-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ee52a0f4be6ffc2aaeb52cd/66f6fea4e5e07456b3374779_Cannabis-ERP-Horizontal-mini.png)
# Cannabis Software for Scalable Operations
Grow your cannabis business with Canix; designed to eliminate frustrating busywork and streamline your operations. Focus on driving growth and maximizing profitability, rather than managing tedious tasks.

### A New Path to Profitability 
Canix's cannabis ERP improves a company's profitability by providing real-time data, automated inventory tracking, compliance with regulations, critical COGS reporting, optimized production and distribution processes, and informed decision-making capabilities for the medical and recreational cannabis supply chain.
Intuitive
Easy access to information enables seamless audits, product lineage, and cost accounting
Flexible
Customizable workflows and process controls help to reduce errors
Streamlined
Integrations **connect** information from across systems into one cannabis software
Intelligent 
Reporting helps you **understand and optimize** your business

Inventory Management
About this feature
Track cannabis inventory through the supply chain and access essential inventory reports. View quantities, costs, usage and purchase of non-cannabis inventory such as planters, papers, manufacturing ingredients, and other related materials. Use recipes for packages and processing workflows to automatically update inventory levels.
![ERP Compliance](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ee52a0f4be6ffc2aaeb52cd/611efdb3b239c9a6a6378c18_ERP%20-%20Compliance.png)
Compliance
About this feature
Metrc integration is foundational to Canix ERP and our bi-directional data sync is the best in the industry. Canix simplifies, automates, and validates Information Metrc data uploaded from Canix.
![ERP Purchase order and invoicing](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ee52a0f4be6ffc2aaeb52cd/611efde0bbd4766e77f32803_ERP%20-%20Purchase%20Orders%20%26%20Invoicing.png)
Invoicing & Purchase Orders
About this feature
Generate and record invoices for your sales orders. Send these invoices through multiple channels including directly to customers via email or web link or directly to accounting systems through our [integrations. ](https://www.canix.com/<#>)Create and track purchase orders for both cannabis and non-cannabis inventory to manage your vendor relationships. Automatically pull in LeafLink orders into Canix for processing through our integration.
![ERP Inventory Availability](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ee52a0f4be6ffc2aaeb52cd/611efe0b60f6613b8bef35af_ERP%20-%20Inventory%20Availability.png)
Live Inventory
About this feature
Use our software to display cannabis products available to your customer with a checkout and ordering system for bulk orders from your distribution or retail partners.
![Task Management ERP](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ee52a0f4be6ffc2aaeb52cd/611efe2f4e6a490c434791d0_ERP%20-%20Task%20Management.png)
Task Management
About this feature
Use Canix to track your employee tasks across the organization with time estimations to develop a complete COGS.
![ERP RFID](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ee52a0f4be6ffc2aaeb52cd/611efe735743218583994eb0_ERP%20-%20RFID.png)
RFID Integration
About this feature
Use RFID scanners to increase the speed of harvesting by 75% with our bluetooth scale integration.
![ERP Bill Reporting](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ee52a0f4be6ffc2aaeb52cd/611efe967855dc0d85efcd6c_ERP%20-%20BII%20Reporting.png)
Business Intelligence Reporting
About this feature
Use custom charts and graphs to track and analyze large data sets and filter specific reports to access multiple facilities.
![ERP Yield Tracking](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ee52a0f4be6ffc2aaeb52cd/611efeb44e6a49c9334791fc_ERP%20-%20Yield%20Tracking.png)
Yield Tracking
About this feature
Understand processing and manufacturing yields percentages. Develop yield trends to identify performance across different departments to develop better forecasting abilities.
![ERP Cultivating forecast](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ee52a0f4be6ffc2aaeb52cd/611efefc9dd4ed2c5b886883_ERP%20-%20Cultivation%20Forecast.png)
Cultivation Forecasting
About this feature
Forecast your cuttings and clones with our nursery forecasting tools to see what available product you have for sale. Start forecasting production trends based on yields and expectations. Determine how much inventory you need to produce for revenue and profit targets.
![ERP COGS Reports](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ee52a0f4be6ffc2aaeb52cd/611eff3145727e5c38140426_ERP%20-%20COGS%20Report.png)
Labor Costing
About this feature
Track labor costs across the organization through. Use the ability for macro level labor assignment or through granular task management.
![ERP Open API](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ee52a0f4be6ffc2aaeb52cd/611eff40bad667ef41d967b5_ERP%20-%20Open%20API.png)
Open API

Create a shopping cart experience for customers purchasing bulk orders directly from available inventory.

About this feature
Input compliance data offline and sync everything once connected to a network.

How We can Help
Canix’s materials tracking allows you to assign and track non-cannabis costs from raw materials to finished goods. Canix segments out costs into different categories, so you get the most accurate breakdown of cost per gram. Costs are automatically assigned, so you can get the most accurate COGS view.
Functionalities
  * Purchase Orders

  * NCI Usage reporting
  * NCI Barcode tracking

How We can Help
For most cannabis companies, labor is the biggest expense. Canix helps you understand the productivity of each individual worker, and tracks time from raw materials to finished goods. Canix helps you understand what employees are most productive, and how labor costs accrue during the production process.
Functionalities
  * Task Management
  * Employee labor analysis
  * Labor Cost tracking

  * Batch Profitability tracking
  * Seed to sale cost tracking
  * Inventory Analysis

generated_description:
### Overview of Canix

**Canix** is a robust SaaS platform launched in 2018, specifically designed to streamline operations within the burgeoning cannabis industry. Founded in San Francisco and part of Y Combinator's S19 batch, the mission of Canix is clear: it provides cannabis businesses with an intuitive way to stay compliant amidst a complex web of regulations while enhancing productivity across the board—from cultivation and processing to distribution.

**Recent Achievements and Recognition**
The company gained significant recognition by winning the **TechCrunch Disrupt 2020** award, an accolade that underscores its innovative approach in the cannabis sector. This reflects not only the effectiveness of its solutions but also its potential for growth in an industry that’s rapidly evolving.

**Team and Operations**
Canix operates with a team of 22 employees dedicated to optimizing cannabis businesses. The company is actively developing a range of features and tools that address the unique challenges faced by cultivators, manufacturers, and distributors. Its software facilitates critical functions including compliance management, task organization, and inventory tracking.

**Product Offering**
Canix's comprehensive Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software helps cannabis businesses automate tedious tasks, reduce labor costs, and improve overall operational efficiency. Some of its standout features include:

- **Inventory Management:** Seamlessly track cannabis and non-cannabis inventory across supply chain operations.
- **Compliance Tools:** Advanced integrations with Metrc to simplify and automate compliance reporting.
- **Task Management:** Keep track of employee tasks and optimize labor costs.
- **Business Intelligence Reporting:** Provide real-time data that aids in decision-making and operational planning.

This all-in-one approach helps cannabis firms not only comply with regulations but also focus on growth and maximizing profitability instead of getting bogged down in manual processes.

**User Experience and Feedback**
Feedback from users highlights Canix's ease of use and its effectiveness in managing the complex needs of cannabis businesses. Customers report significant time savings and improved tracking of compliance metrics compared to traditional systems. The platform boasts a customer satisfaction score of **96.9%**, a testament to its user-friendly design and strong support infrastructure.

**Expansion and Impact**
With operations scaling across 26 states and managing over **650 cannabis facilities worldwide**, Canix is quickly establishing itself as a leader in the cannabis technology space. As of now, it supports diverse companies from small cultivators to large manufacturers, evidencing its adaptability across various business sizes.

In summary, Canix is not just a compliance tool; it’s a strategic partner for cannabis businesses looking to thrive in a competitive marketplace. With a commitment to innovation and user satisfaction, Canix is well-positioned to tackle the future of cannabis operations. For more insights or to explore their solutions, visit their [website](https://www.canix.com/).
